text: The Lancia Dedra is an automobile produced by Lancia. It replaced the Lancia Prisma in 1989, and was replaced by the Lancia Lybra in 2000. It was offered as a sedan and as a station wagon. The Dedra shared its mechanics with the Fiat Tempra. == Engines == * 1.6 i.e. 55 kW (75 hp), 57 kW (78 hp), 65 kW (88 hp) and 66 kW (90 hp) * 1.6 i.e. 16V 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.8 i.e. 66 kW (90 hp), 74 kW (101 hp), 77 kW (105 hp) and 80 kW (109 hp) * 1.8 i.e. 16V 83 kW (113 hp) and 96 kW (130 hp) * 2.0 i.e. 83 kW (113 hp) and 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.0 i.e. 16V 102 kW (139 hp) * 2.0 i.e. HF Turbo 119 kW (162 hp) * 2.0 i.e. HF Integrale 124 kW (169 hp) * 2.0 turbo ds 66 kW (90 hp) Dedra Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Lancia Dedra
